20110121190622.000|20110121190623.000|CC1|NORMALLY SEE.

20110121190625.000|20110121190626.000|CC1|NORTHEAST.

20110121190635.000|20110121190635.000|CC1|US.

20110121190636.000|20110121190638.000|CC1|WIND BLOWING IN YOUR FACE.

20110121190639.000|20110121190639.000|CC1|WINTER.

20110121190640.000|20110121190643.000|CC1|MONTH.                          
20110121190643.000|20110121190644.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YES.               
20110121190644.000|20110121190646.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, YOU PUT IT IN         
20110121190646.000|20110121190647.000|CC1|PERSPECTIVE, IT LOOKS BRUTAL OUT
20110121190647.000|20110121190648.000|CC1|HERE, TAMRON, BUT THE FACT OF   
20110121190648.000|20110121190650.000|CC1|THE MATTER IS THAT, IF YOU

20110121190651.000|20110121190653.000|CC1|HERE TO INTERNATIONAL FALLS, IT 
20110121190653.000|20110121190656.000|CC1|IS 75 DEGREES WARMER HERE, AND

20110121193710.000|20110121193713.000|CC1|MARK, WHAT IS THE LATEST?       
20110121193713.000|20110121193715.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS IS A CASE THAT
20110121193715.000|20110121193717.000|CC1|SAYS WHY PEOPLE ARE SAYING      
20110121193717.000|20110121193718.000|CC1|MEXICO IS ONE OF THE MOST       
20110121193718.000|20110121193719.000|CC1|DANGEROUS PLACES IN THE WORLD
